alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hall; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 09 at 7:10PM CDT until April 09 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHEASTERN ADAMS...SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON AND SOUTHEASTERN HALL COUNTIES... At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hansen, or near Hastings, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Quarter to half dollar size hail was reported two miles north of Hastings. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grand Island, Hastings, Doniphan, Giltner, Trumbull and Hansen. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 311 and 321. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
